activities: Personal information for employees is used for informational and internal reporting purposes only in the course of conducting day to day personal administration.  No information is shared outside of the company for any reason.
corpofftitle1: Chief Legal Officer and Corporate Secretary
industrysector: Electrical Power Systems - (ELP)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)Iron & Steel - (IRN)
personaldata: Browsing our website and most other products or services do not require any personally identifying information.
recoursemech:
As part of AZZ’s participation in the Safe Harbor, we have agreed to TRUSTe dispute resolution for disputes relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Framework. If you have any complaints regarding our compliance with the Safe Harbor you should first contact us (as provided below). Under the Safe Harbor program, any unresolved privacy complaints can be referred to an independent dispute resolution mechanism. AZZ uses TRUSTe. Please visit http://www.truste.com/about-truste/contact-us/ for fax and postal mail information. TRUSTe Dispute Resolution process is only available in English.  
For human resources data we have agreed to cooperate with the European Data Protection Authorities.
